snippet: At 16, Victoria Duval of Boca Raton, Fla., is signing autographs and basking in the warmth of attention and curiosity befitting a United States girls 18-and-under champion and wild-card entrant in the United States Open women's singles championship.
abstract: At 16, Victoria Duval of Boca Raton, Fla., is signing autographs and basking in the warmth of attention and curiosity befitting a United States girls 18-and-under champion and wild-card entrant in the United States Open women's singles championship.

headline.main: Young U.S. Player Relishes First Taste of Spotlight
